4314380.name: Infinite Game Cartridge Collection - Squarely Jump
4314380.description:
This DLC adds Squarely Jump to the collection.

Squarely Jump is a minimalist one-button action platformer where you control a simple square navigating through increasingly challenging obstacle courses.

Jump as a square over rectangles and reach the goal in each level — that's all there is to it! With precise timing and a single input (jump), guide your square across gaps, platforms, and hazards in a clean, retro-inspired 2D world. No complex controls, no unnecessary fluff — just pure, addictive jumping mechanics that test your reflexes and patience.
